publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-627 Ms Margaret Curran: Progress in Respect of Fuel Poverty in Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the new fuel poverty figures from the Scottish House Condition Survey 2002 as good news for Scotland; endorses the Scottish Executive’s current fuel poverty programmes, and reaffirms the commitment to eradicate fuel poverty as far as reasonably practicable by 2016. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*
